location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ronald Thompson, Tehran, to Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Thompson's intention to travel to England via the Caspian, Caucasus and Crimea.The letter also reports on the movements of Grand Duke Constantine [Grand Duke Konstantin Nikolayevich of Russia] and the Emperor (Alexander II) and thanks Pelly for sending him the cigars, which he intends to use on his travels through Russia.
